message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a little more to start, you get a chance to make it up next round.
I think it's only fair to offer a slightly larger share this time, as you didn't get what you wanted last round.  I'm confident we can find a solution that works for us both.
Bob, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both lose less to inflation with further delays.
